title: [45w#69] [osu!lazer] 2020.508.2 更新日志
author: 45gfg9
txt_content:
本帖最后由 45gfg9 于 2020-5-9 09:35 编辑 
osu!lazer 2020.508.2 [ruby=更新日志]Changelog[/ruby]
osu!lazer at GitHub
Release page

Python轮子不好用 我来祸害php了
今天的更新日志还是一如既往地放飞

Code Quality 代码质量
[√] Remove obsoleted RuntimeInfo properties. (osu-framework#3482) author: Game4all
[√] 移除废弃的RuntimeInfo属性 (osu-framework#3482)
[√] Implement period-tracking component (osu#8701) author: iiSaLMaN
[√] 实现分时追踪组件 (osu#8701)
[√] Fix typo and add spaces to comments (osu#8944) author: TheBicPen
[√] 修复拼写错误并给注释加上空格 (osu#8944)
[√] Commit autogenerated rider VCS settings update (osu-framework#3528) author: peppy
[√] 提交自动生成的Rider VCS设置更新 (osu-framework#3528)

Editor 编辑器
[√] Fix mania crashing on undo/redo (osu#8913) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复mania在撤销/重做时崩溃 (osu#8913)
[√] Fix undo/redo behaving poorly with simultaneous objects (osu#8914) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复处理连续物件时撤销/重做表现差 (osu#8914)

Framework 框架
[√] Rework dynamic compilation to use Roslyn-backed type resolution (osu-framework#3497) author: smoogipoo
[√] 用Roslyn支持的类型解析重构动态编译 (osu-framework#3497)
[√] Use DisplayModes rather than AvailableResolutions (osu#8623) author: swoolcock
[√] 用DisplayModes代替AvailableResolutions (osu#8623)
[√] Improve logging and exclude Game types from dynamic compilation (osu-framework#3505) author: smoogipoo
[√] 在动态编译中优化日志记录和排除游戏类型 (osu-framework#3505)
[√] Fix package downgrade error (osu-framework#3509) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复包降级错误 (osu-framework#3509)
[√] Fix dynamic compilation exclusions failing via nuget package (osu-framework#3508) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复通过nuget包动态编译时排除失败 (osu-framework#3508)
[+] Add texture cropping (osu-framework#3506) author: Tom94
[+] 添加材质剪裁 (osu-framework#3506)
[√] Fix build warnings (osu-framework#3512) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复构建错误 (osu-framework#3512)
[√] Fix static log targets not being purged when a custom log storage location is specified (osu-framework#3516) author: peppy
[√] 修复当自定义日志存储位置指定时静态日志目标未被清除 (osu-framework#3516)
[√] Refactor storage to allow more flexibility in root location (osu-framework#3522) author: peppy
[√] 重构根目录存储以提升灵活性 (osu-framework#3522)

Gameplay 游戏体验
[√] Fix samples occasionally playing before volume adjustment can be applied (osu-framework#3496) author: peppy
[√] 修复样例偶尔在音量调节应用前播放 (osu-framework#3496)

Gameplay (osu!catch) 游戏体验 (osu!catch)
[√] Implement Sorcerer's osu!catch difficulty calculation adjustments (osu#8934) author: smoogipoo
[√] 实现Sorcerer的osu!catch难度计算调整 (osu#8934)
[√] Fix crash when finishing osu!catch beatmaps (osu#8959) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复完成osu!catch谱面时崩溃 (osu#8959)

Input 输入
[√] Implement MIDI input support (osu-framework#2804) author: HoLLy-HaCKeR
[√] 实现MIDI输入支持 (osu-framework#2804)

Performance 性能
[+] Add local beatmap lookup cache to improve performance of imports (osu#8924) author: peppy
[+] 添加本地谱面查询缓存以提升导入性能 (osu#8924)

Platform 平台
[√] Fix calling GetStorageForDirectory with empty string failing lookup (osu-framework#3527) author: peppy
[√] 修复调用GetStorageForDirectory传空字符串时查询失败 (osu-framework#3527)
[√] Fix android usage of obsoleted VersionCode (osu#8970) author: peppy
[√] 修复安卓使用废弃的VersionCode (osu#8970)

Skinning (osu!taiko) 皮肤 (osu!taiko)
[√] Move taiko additive blending locally to avoid applying to legacy skins (osu#8901) author: peppy
[√] 将taiko特效混合移动至本地以防止应用到旧皮肤 (osu#8901)
[+] Add kiai support to osu!taiko skinned playfields (osu#8910) author: peppy
[+] 给osu!taiko皮肤场添加kiai支持 (osu#8910)
[√] Fix skinned taiko hit explosions not being removed on rewind (osu#8909) author: peppy
[√] 修复使用皮肤的taiko击打效果在回退时未移除 (osu#8909)

Song Select 歌曲选择
[√] Show loading spinner when carousel is not ready to be displayed (osu#8903) author: peppy
[√] 传送带未准备好显示时显示加载圈 (osu#8903)
[√] Fix hard crash when changing ruleset while presenting a score (osu#8933) author: peppy
[√] 修复当前有成绩时修改ruleset导致硬崩溃 (osu#8933)
[√] Fix potential null reference when filtering beatmaps (osu#8958) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复筛选谱面时可能的空引用 (osu#8958)

Testing 测试
[√] Fix song select tests potentially failing due to difficulty panels not yet displayed (osu#8932) author: peppy
[√] 修复歌曲选择测试由于难度面板还未显示而失败 (osu#8932)
[√] Fix video test not working (osu-framework#3521) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复视频测试不工作 (osu-framework#3521)

Tournament 锦标赛
[+] Add support for 3v3 tournament chroma key layout (osu#8961) author: peppy
[+] 支持3v3锦标赛chroma键盘布局 (osu#8961)

UI 界面
[√] Truncate beatmap title and artist on score panel (osu#8919) author: Joehuu
[√] 移除得分面板的谱面标题和歌手 (osu#8919)
[√] Fix dropdown with nothing selected throwing on pre-selecting afterwards (osu-framework#3500) author: iiSaLMaN
[√] 修复下拉菜单未选择项目时在预选后抛出异常(?) (osu-framework#3500)
[√] Fix date tooltip not showing in 24-hour format (osu#8960) author: Joehuu
[√] 修复日期工具栏不以24小时制显示 (osu#8960)

UX 用户体验
[√] Allow closing the game during intro (osu#8905) author: peppy
[√] 允许intro时关闭游戏 (osu#8905)

replies.author: 莉莉霍瓦特
replies.txt_content: 这就是那个练好了能愉快的输入谷歌验证码的游戏吗

replies.author: 安梦梦
replies.txt_content:
授 权 搬 运
ppy又放飞自我了（误）

replies.author: 索菲缇娅
replies.txt_content:
艹，我的音游论坛...
OSU 3星以上没一个打的过的...
